文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: The corrosion of Zircaloy in water reactors is dependent on the water chemistry of the primary coolant and the fast neutron flux.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: Under standard pressurized water reactor (PWR) coolant conditions with hydrogen overpressure, resulting in a low oxygen content in the primary coolant, the fast neutron flux has no measurable influence on the corrosion rate.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: Under oxygenated coolant conditions, typically for boiling water reactors (BWRs), the corrosion is enhanced by the fast neutron flux from the early beginning.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: Three different types of oxide have been observed.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: Most of the material was in the stress relieved condition as specified by KWU.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: However, some experimental cladding tubes were fully or partially recrystallized

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: However, some experimental cladding tubes were fully or partially recrystallized

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk1
证据片段: the corrosion in PWRs under low oxygen conditions is almost comparable to the out-pile behavior.

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk2
证据片段: Measurements on experimental fuel rods with fully recrystallized cladding revealed the same flux and time exponents as fuel rods with standard stress relieved cladding

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk2
证据片段: The ovalization of unsupported cladding tubes of both unpressurized and prepressurized fuel rods

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk3
证据片段: Tubes with a high compressive tangential stress (closed tubes) show a larger length increase than the stress free open rods

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk3
证据片段: relative length increase due to anisotropic creep was found to be $1 / _ { 1 0 }$ of the relative diameter decreases
样品状态: fuel rods with anisotropic cladding and normal texture

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk3
证据片段: mean of the length increase together with the standard deviation is shown as a function of fast neutron dose

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk3
证据片段: The growth of fully annealed Zircaloy used for experimental fuel rods or channels showed a different dependence on the fast neutron dose. This type of material grows proportional to the square root of the neutron dose

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk3
证据片段: By increasing the amount of recrystallization as determined by transmission electron microscopy, growth and cladding creep-down decrease

证据片段: It was shown that the amount of recrystallization plays an important role for irradiation creep and growth

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk4
证据片段: In general, the corrosion of Zircaloy in PWRs follows the out-of-pile behavior

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk4
证据片段: The corrosion of Zircaloy in BWRs is generally influenced by the fast neutron flux

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk4
证据片段: A time exponent between 0.4 and 0.65 and a fast flux exponent of 0.7 to 1.0 has been derived

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk4
证据片段: Growth of stress relieved material was found to follow a linear relationship, whereas annealed material shows a saturation in growth with increasing fast neutron dose

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk5
证据片段: Most of the data presented relates to Zircaloy-2 in the stress-relieved condition

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk5
证据片段: results from elements with recrystallized cladding show that oxidation resistance can be improved by this treatment

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk5
证据片段: The maximum depth of oxidation is correlated to fast neutron dose

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_009_chunk5
证据片段: apparently little affected by coolant mass flow-rate or steam quality
